intro: Build and run your very own old-fashioned village supermarket! Sell products, expand your store and become a legendary trading manager!
description:
Step back in time and manage your very own village supermarket! In Village Supermarket Simulator – Old Times Edition, experience the charm of a traditional marketplace while building your business from the ground up.

Key Features:
* Run Your Village Market: Stock shelves, serve customers, and manage daily operations in a cozy, old-timey village setting.
* Upgrade and Expand: Improve your store, unlock new products, and attract more villagers to boost your profits.
* Decorate Your Shop: Customize your market with rustic decorations and create a welcoming environment for your customers.

Manage, trade, and thrive—can you turn your small village market into a legendary old-time supermarket empire?
